alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:08PM CST until January 01 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CST FOR CENTRAL LAUDERDALE AND WESTERN COLBERT COUNTIES... At 307 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cherokee, or 11 miles northeast of Tishomingo State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Red Rock, Posey Loop, Mynot, Pride Landing, Threet, Mt Hester, New Bethel, Oakland and Barton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
